item.title: Ditch Your CMS by Using Hugo and GitHub Pages to Deploy a Truly Static Site
item.description: For developers, product managers, and directors we are continuously striving to find a development, user experience, and cost equilibrium for our projects. Each person on the team wants to complete projects efficiently without sacrificing quality. In my career as a CMS developer, project manager, and solution architect, one of the most frustrating things is being forced to use the wrong tool for the job at hand because of a reason outside the control of the project team.
